objects.name: Process Metadata
objects.description: Contextual data about a running process, which may include information such as environment variables, image name, user/owner, etc.

x_mitre_log_sources.name: Process
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: None

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: subsystem=com.apple.process

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: CodeIntegrity/WDAC events indicating unsigned/invalid DLL loads

x_mitre_log_sources.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: sudo or service accounts invoking loaders with suspicious env vars

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:osquery
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Process Context

x_mitre_log_sources.name: esxi:auth
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: user session

x_mitre_log_sources.name: networkdevice:syslog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Admin activity

x_mitre_log_sources.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: execve call for sudo where euid != uid

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: subsystem=com.apple.TCC

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: exec of binary with setuid/setgid and EUID != UID

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: process

x_mitre_log_sources.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Use of fork/exec with DISPLAY unset or redirected

x_mitre_log_sources.name: EDR:Telemetry
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Process lineage and API usage enrichment (GetSystemTime, GetTimeZoneInformation, NtQuerySystemTime)

x_mitre_log_sources.name: esxi:hostd
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: /var/log/hostd.log API calls reading/altering time/ntp settings

x_mitre_log_sources.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: execve, prctl, or ptrace activity affecting process memory or command-line arguments

x_mitre_log_sources.name: linux:osquery
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Cross-reference argv[0] with actual executable path and parent process metadata

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:AppLocker
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: AppLocker audit/blocks showing developer utilities executing scripts/binaries outside policy

x_mitre_log_sources.name: EDR:hunting
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Correlation of signer info, parent-child lineage, rare invocation context (user host role), and API surfaces (CreateProcess*, LoadLibrary*)

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Security-Mitigations/KernelMode
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: ETW telemetry indicating ClickOnce deployment (dfsvc.exe) launching payloads

x_mitre_log_sources.name: etw:Microsoft-Windows-ClickOnce
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: provider: Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) events associated with ClickOnce deployment (dfsvc.exe activity)

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Windows Camera Frame Server/Operational
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Process session start/stop events for camera pipeline by unexpected executables

x_mitre_log_sources.name: linux:osquery
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: select: path LIKE '/dev/video%'

x_mitre_log_sources.name: linux:osquery
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: state=attached/debugged

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Code Execution & Entitlement Access

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Process opening SSH_AUTH_SOCK or /tmp/ssh-* socket not owned by same UID

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: code signature/memory protection

x_mitre_log_sources.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: execve with UID ≠ EUID

x_mitre_log_sources.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: execve with escalated privileges

x_mitre_log_sources.name: AWS:CloudTrail
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: cross-account or unexpected assume role

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: log collect from launchd and process start

x_mitre_log_sources.name: containerd:events
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Docker or containerd image pulls and process executions

x_mitre_log_sources.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Kernel or daemon warnings of downgraded TLS or cryptographic settings

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Modifications or writes to EFI system partition for downgraded bootloaders

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: non-shell process tree accessing bash history

x_mitre_log_sources.name: linux:osquery
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: process metadata mismatch between /proc and runtime attributes

x_mitre_log_sources.name: linux:osquery
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: process environment variables containing LD_PRELOAD

x_mitre_log_sources.channel: EventCode=400, 403

x_mitre_log_sources.channel: process_start: EventHeader.ProcessId true parent vs reported PPID mismatch

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:endpointsecurity
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: ES_EVENT_TYPE_NOTIFY_EXEC, ES_EVENT_TYPE_NOTIFY_MMAP

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Unsigned/invalid signature modules or images loaded by msbuild.exe or its children

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-DeviceGuard/Operational
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: WDAC policy audit/block affecting msbuild.exe spawned payloads

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-SmartAppControl/Operational
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Smart App Control decisions (audit/block) for msbuild.exe-launched executables

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Unsigned or untrusted modules loaded during JamPlus.exe runtime
